name: Beltion: Beyond Ritual
storyline: After many years in training, Orvin is inducted into the service of the Vault of Equilibrium as an Erm-Savann. Proving his loyalty, resourcefulness and skill as a warrior, he rises up the ranks to eventually become a key confidant of the Vault's leader, who entrusts Orvin with gathering four magical crystals needed to bring forth the great flying ship known as Beltion.
summary: Beltion: Beyond Ritual is a fantasy action RPG with steampunk elements. The game is set in the diverse world of Sarmontazara and includes a large variety of weapons and types of armor for players to utilize on their quest to summon the enigmatic power of Beltion.
